technique_name: 蹬腿 Dēng Tuí (Heel Push Kick)
deduction_content: 弹（蹬、蹬）腿由腰到伸摆动小于45° - The kicking leg does not transit from obvious bent (45° or more) to completely straight

questions.question: What is the error code for Dēng Tuí (Heel Push Kick)?
What is the main deduction point for Dēng Tuí (Heel Push Kick)?
questions.answer: A deduction is applied when the kicking leg does not transit from obvious bent (45° or more) to completely straight.

questions.question: What is the minimum angle requirement for the bent leg before extending in Dēng Tuí?
questions.answer: The kicking leg must be bent at least 45° or more before transitioning to completely straight.
